new.item: The WN_XML_CHAR flag has been added to the examples Makefile to allow its use in compilation of libnucnet.

internal.item: The extern "C" has been moved to avoid template specialization errors.

fix.item: Calculation of Ye has been moved from the correction callback routine to the calling function.

new.item: A routine to copy the clusters from one equilibrium to another has been added to the API.
The sourceforge web site for this project now uses Allura.
A routine to retrieve the number of clusters in an equilibrium has been added to the API.

fix.item: The examples Makefile has been cleaned up.
The code now uses extern "C" for C++ compilers.

new.item: It is now possible to include a correction function to the WSE relation among neutrons, protons, and leptons.
New examples demonstrate the WSE correction function.
Code is now hosted at SourceForge.net.
The examples/ directory now includes a regression test script generator.

reorganization.item: Examples directory has moved to same level as src/.
Example codes now have descriptive names.
